Package com.fssa.projectprovision.service

Class TaskService

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.projectprovision.service.TaskService
public class TaskService extends Object
A service class that provides methods for managing tasks in the system. This class interacts with the TaskDAO to perform CRUD operations on tasks. It also uses TaskValidator for task validation.
Author:
JayaprakashJaisankar
